pageTitle: Las Vegas Hotel - Sam's Town Hotel
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {9178=Sam's Town Live! at Sam's Town Las Vegas Hotel is a state-of-the art, 1100-seat multi-use facility. The intimate setting will house concerts and other events, and is capable of showcasing a variety of set-up options, from concerts to banquets to a nightclub., 12111=Suddenly, the serenity is interrupted with the urgency of a wolf's call, howling from atop the waterfall. It's the beginning of Sunset Stampede, a free laser light and water show. At 2:00 p.m., 6:00 p.m., 8:00 p.m. and 10:00 p.m. daily, the mountain in the Mystic Falls Indoor Park comes alive as the Sunset Stampede chronicles the Western pioneer experience with music, lights and animation., 2879=Interstate highways I-15 and I-95 go through Las Vegas. Most hotels are on the Strip (Las Vegas Blvd. South) and Fremont Street downtown. For road conditions, call 702-486-3116. Radio frequency 1016 AM.}
textBeforeTable: Average Driving Time to Las Vegas Seat Belts Buckle Up! Nevada law requires seat belt use by all occupants in a vehicle. Children under age 5 who weigh less than 40 pounds must be in an approved safety seat which is properly installed. Interstate highways I-15 and I-95 go through Las Vegas. Most hotels are on the Strip (Las Vegas Blvd. South) and Fremont Street downtown. For road conditions, call 702-486-3116. Radio frequency 1016 AM. Las Vegas Information Information is subject to change without notice. Childcare at hotel: This Las Vegas hotel does not have childcare facility on site. Hotel can offer guests phone numbers for outside childcare services in Las Vegas. The childcare service can send employees to your hotel room to care your children. Strip Shuttle: Yes, this hotel offers shuttle service to the Las Vegas Strip. Airport Shuttle: This hotel does not offer their own shuttle service to Las Vegas McCarran Airport (LAS). There are 24 hours public shuttle services from Las Vegas airport to most Las Vegas hotels. It cost about $5 per person one way. No reservation needed. When you need to return to the airport from your Las Vegas hotel, just call the shuttle company. They will go to your Las Vegas hotel to pick you up. RV park: Yes.
